channel.title: James's Runescape Thread
channel.description:
Hello,
This is my runescape thread for my general runescape questions, as I have been opening to many topics.
[center][i]Question 1:[/i][/center] [center][s]What is the best way to level Magic without raising hitpoints?[/s][/center] [center]----------[/center] [center][i]Question 2:[/i][/center] [center]Where is the best place to mine coal closest to the bank? mining guild or coal trucks?[/center] [center]----------[/center]
They are my current questions ( 2 of many ).
Thanks.

item.title: James's Runescape Thread
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:10, topic:256354”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=338606.msg2628329#msg2628329 date=1231962196]
This is the best way of getting coal, that I know of;

  • Teleport to Barbarian assault using games necklace
  • Run to Coal trucks, mine until full inventory
  • Use glory to teleport to edgeville, bank, repeat

Possibly faster ways, though.
[/quote]
why not telly back to barb assault and use deposit box?[/quote]

Forgot about that. Also you can teleport to Bounty hunter with the games necklace on the last charge to get another charged one.

Read full topic

item.title: James's Runescape Thread
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

you can curse over and over until the curse lands. so attack something hugely over your level.

The zombies under the mage guild where good exp back in the day.

I would recomend high alchemy though. Twas how i did it. Faster i reckon

Read full topic

item.title: James's Runescape Thread
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

And wear full armor, so you don’t hit. Or else, you gotta wait along time between each cast.

Read full topic

item.title: James's Runescape Thread
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“I james I, post:3, topic:256354”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=338606.msg2627117#msg2627117 date=1231871789]
1: Curse like spells. Those that require mind runes.
[/quote]

Yes I bought a mud staff, and minds, but they can only best cast once, where is best place to cast.[/quote]

I remember there was a place with npc’s that you could curse multiple times. But where they were I can’t remember.

Read full topic
